Advanced Entry Bridging Module 2014

Kevin St. (August 25th - 29th, 2014)
Follow @__bjg

1. Foundational Maths Topics

Please review the following articles and attempt the exercises in each. Familiarise yourself with the material and note down any concepts or exercisex that you may have difficulty with. We can review these in areas in class

  • Number Systems
  • Fractions & Decimals
  • Algebra
  • Equations
  • Factorisation
  • Graphing Lines
  • Quadratic Graphs
  • Solving Problems
  • Indices & Logarithms

2. Core Programming Skills

In this segment, we will review core programming skills and concepts using the Go programming language. You should watch the lectures as they come available and then attempt the exercises which follow. We will review this material and solutions in class
